main_definition: Potato is primarily a starchy, tuberous crop of the plant Solanum tuberosum, widely cultivated as an important food crop globally.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A common slang term referring to someone who is considered unintelligent or lacks intellect.
An idiomatic expression used in British English humorously referring to a dull person or something that has little value or importance.
meanings_and_examples.example: I don't care about his opinion; he is just a potato.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A derogatory term implying someone who is uncoordinated, awkward or lacking physical dexterity.
meanings_and_examples.example: He can't even tie his shoelaces without looking like a clumsy potato.
